description.en:
Next generation Trading on Decentralized Exchange.

ZERO Swap fees when trading.
NO Front-Running Bots.
NO Price Slipage.
When placing trades on KROMatika, the user does not pay swap fee as on other DEXes, but pays service fee instead.
The service fee on Kromatika is FIXED, regardless of the amount swapped.
The service fee is paid in KROM tokens.
KROM token allows for huge savings on the service fee, close to having a ZERO service fees.
